designSystem.name: Geek Creations Brand Design System
designSystem.description: Comprehensive visual design profile based on provided palette and branding screenshots. Strictly limited to the exact 5 colors: indigo-ink (#401268), mauve (#c5a3ff), porcelain (#f8f6f0), honey-bronze (#e2ae3d), scarlet-rush (#e21b35). All styling must use these colors only.

paletteStripe.applicationContext: Full-width hero or section backgrounds only. DO NOT apply to cards, buttons, or icons.

pageBackground.context: Overall site background in light mode
pageBackground.doNot: DO NOT use dark colors like #401268 for full page background unless dark mode

cards.border: none or 1px solid #e0e0e0 (neutral, not from palette if not matching)
cards.context: Design gallery cards, product cards – white/off-white base for high contrast with designs

text.doNot: DO NOT use mauve (#c5a3ff) for body text – reserve for accents/hovers

cards.doNot: DO NOT apply full palette gradient to card backgrounds. DO NOT use #e21b35 or #e2ae3d as card base.

hover.doNot: DO NOT shift to #e21b35 on hover unless call-to-action specific

primary.context: Main CTAs – Buy Now, Add to Cart

accent.context: Limited use – urgent actions, sale badges

buttons.doNot: DO NOT use #e2ae3d as button background unless specifically for warm accents. DO NOT apply gradients to buttons.

action.fill: #ffffff on colored background, or #401268 on light

icons.doNot: DO NOT fill icons with #f8f6f0. DO NOT apply gradients to icon fills.

logo.context: Main logo uses indigo-ink base with mauve highlight

shadows.buttons: none or subtle inset on press

hoverAnimations.cards: lift + shadow increase + optional mauve border glow
hoverAnimations.buttons: darken background + scale down slightly on press

lightMode.recommended: Primary mode based on porcelain background

darkMode.note: Implement toggle if required – reverse contrasts

doNot: DO NOT apply the multi-color palette gradient to any component except full-section heroes.
DO NOT use scarlet-rush (#e21b35) or honey-bronze (#e2ae3d) as primary backgrounds.
DO NOT put button gradients on icons or text.
DO NOT use mauve (#c5a3ff) as main body text color.
DO NOT forget shadows on cards for depth.
DO NOT deviate from exact hex values provided.
